solution_line_template: The number of dollars from the quarters is {total_quarters} * ${value_of_quarter} = $<<{total_quarters}*{value_of_quarter}={dollars_from_quarters}>>{dollars_from_quarters}
The number of dollars from the dimes is {num_dimes} * ${value_of_dime} = $<<{num_dimes}*{value_of_dime}={dollars_from_dimes}>>{dollars_from_dimes}
The number of dollars from the nickels is {num_nickels} * ${value_of_nickel} = $<<{num_nickels}*{value_of_nickel}={dollars_from_nickels}>>{dollars_from_nickels}

The total number of dollars is ${dollars_from_quarters} + ${dollars_from_dimes} + ${dollars_from_nickels} = $<<{dollars_from_quarters}+{dollars_from_dimes}+{dollars_from_nickels}={total_dollars}>>{total_dollars}
